name: Double Edged Short - 4 Hour Game Jam
name_original: Double Edged Short - 4 Hour Game Jam
description:
Rules :
Survive by keeping all the stat bars in balance.
When a stat bar hits the far end of any side, you lose. 
You win by beating all the quests

Current Quests:
- Prologue
- Slime Pollution

Source Code Itch.io version:
https://github.com/Darkfafi/4hGameJam-DifferentKindOfCombat/tree/1.1.0
